nodes.text: Storage tank sixteen was a fuel storage tank located in Fuel City, which was located on the moon Sulon, near fueling station six. While battling Imperial troops, pilot Jan Ors destroyed storage tank sixteen, prompting air-traffic controllers Zyak and Nomo to try and shut off the fuel valves for the rest of the tanks, in order to minimize the risk of them exploding from a fuel leakage. However, before they could act, Ors destroyed tanks fifteen, fourteen, and thirteen. Zyak deserted his post as a result, leaving the inexperienced Nomo in charge.
